scripts.version-test: npm run install-pnpm && npm run all-test && pnpm -v > version/pnpm-version && mv version version-$npm_config_pnpm_version
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules/ pnpm-lock.yaml && cp package.template.json package.json
scripts.all-test: rm -rf version && mkdir version && pnpm add-all && pnpm install-all && pnpm print
scripts.print: find . -name '*.log' -exec echo {} \; && echo '---' && find version -name '*.log' -exec cat {} \; && echo '---'
scripts.add-all: pnpm add-v2.0 && pnpm add-major-v2.0 && pnpm add-minor-v2.0
scripts.add-v2.0: pnpm add -D vue@2.0 --no-lockfile -- > version/add-v2.0.log && cp package.json version/package.add-v2.0.json && pnpm clean
scripts.add-major-v2.0: pnpm add -D vue@^2.0 --no-lockfile -- > version/add-major-v2.0.log && cp package.json version/package.add-major-v2.0.json && pnpm clean
scripts.add-minor-v2.0: pnpm add -D vue@~2.0 --no-lockfile -- > version/add-minor-v2.0.log && cp package.json version/package.add-minor-v2.0.json && pnpm clean
scripts.install-all: pnpm install-v2.0 && pnpm install-major-v2.0 && pnpm install-minor-v2.0 && pnpm install-minor-v2.0
scripts.install-v2.0: cp version/package.add-v2.0.json package.json && pnpm install --no-lockfile -- > version/install-v2.0.log && pnpm clean
scripts.install-major-v2.0: cp version/package.add-major-v2.0.json package.json && pnpm install --no-lockfile -- > version/install-major-v2.0.log && pnpm clean
scripts.install-minor-v2.0: cp version/package.add-minor-v2.0.json package.json && pnpm install --no-lockfile -- > version/install-minor-v2.0.log && pnpm clean
